title: Consumption loan portfolio expands 15pc to Rs 90 lakh cr in FY'24: Report
description: India's consumption loan portfolio grew by 15.2% YoY to Rs 90.3 lakh crore as of March 2024, according to a CRIF High Mark report. The growth slowed from 17.4% in March 2023 due to deceleration in home loans. Personal loans and two-wheeler loans showed strong growth, while MSME lending displayed mixed results.
